headline: BlackRock's Larry Fink Says the Classic 60/40 Portfolio Is Dead. Here Are the ETFs to Buy Instead.
summary: BlackRock (NYSE: BLK) is one of the largest asset managers on Earth, and its CEO, Larry Fink, gets a lot of attention on Wall Street.  Here's what Fink's updated portfolio might look like for you.  You can set this portfolio up with just two ETFs and two trades.
